original_title: Meet You in the Parking Lot
overview: Following the cryptic instructions from a battered Mead composition book, best friends Sam and Alex hope to get a glimpse of their lives-to-come by performing a ritual designed to conjure their future selves... (Screamfest)
tagline: Sit in the chair. Say the words. Do not leave the circle.
title: Meet You in the Parking Lot
